Title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
Writer: Piers Ashworth (screenplay), Nick Moorcroft (screenplay), Ronald Searle (inspired by the original drawings of), Jamie Minoprio (additional material), Jonathan M. Stern (additional material)
Actors: Rupert Everett, Colin Firth, David Tennant, Talulah Riley
Plot: The girls of St. Trinians are on the hunt for buried treasure after discovering headmistress Miss Fritton is related to a famous pirate.
